enb_long_title: Forty-first Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-41)
sentences: During this session (14-17 October 2013, Batumi, Georgia), the Panel considered and adopted two methodology reports: the 2013 Supplement to the 2006 IPCC Guidelines for National GHG Inventories: Wetlands; and the 2013 Revised Supplementary Methods and Good Practice Guidance Arising from the Kyoto Protocol.
The IPCC also undertook initial discussions on mapping the IPCC s future.
